snippet.title: The Coveted Mirror walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Polarware)
snippet.description:
The Coveted Mirror (http://mocagh.org/loadpage.php?getgame=covetedmirror-comprehend) was a graphics adventure game published by Polarware in 1986 for the Apple ][. It was a re-release of the game using the Comprehend 2.0 interpreter (http://graphicsmagician.com/polarware/compadv.htm).

The player needs to find 5 pieces of mirror to restore the coveted mirror and stop the evil King Voar from ruling the Kingdom of Starbury. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - mocagh.org
Walkthrough - mocagh.org, textfiles.com (The Saint)
